title: Angie Kent's best friend Yvie Jones reveals who she hopes she ends up with on The Bachelorette
text:
As Angie Kent continues her quest for love on The Bachelorette, her best friend Yvie Jones has already picked a winner.

Appearing on The Project on Thursday, the 46-year-old former Gogglebox star spoke candidly about who she hopes the 29-year-old Bachelorette will end up with.

'The guy that gets his kit off is ballsy enough to get my tick,' she said, referencing potential suitor Ciarran Stott.

Picking a winner: Appearing on The Project on Thursday, Yvie Jones (pictured) spoke candidly about who she hopes Angie Kent will end up with

In addition to his past as a stripper at a gay club in Darwin, the cheeky Brit happily stripped down for a live drawing class during Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette.

Both Yvie and Angie were left gobsmacked after Ciarran didn't hesitate to remove all of his clothes, before posing confidently in front of the class.

'There he is, completely naked! That's a very nice body,' Angie remarked to Yvie, prompting her best friend to tell her to 'take it all in'.

'The guy that gets his kit off is ballsy enough to get my tick,' she said, referencing potential suitor Ciarran Stott

Getting it all off: The cheeky Brit happily stripped down for a live drawing class during Thursday's episode of The Bachelorette

Later pulling Yvie aside on The Bachelorette, Angie asked her friend who she liked the best out of all of the guys on the show.

Without hesitating, Yvie mentioned Ciarran, telling Angie she liked the fact he's 'silly'.

And it seemed Ciarran was equally as impressed with Yvie, raving about her after their lighthearted chat, with just a bunch of grapes preserving his modesty.

Mutual appreciation: It seemed Ciarran was equally as impressed with Yvie, raving about her after their lighthearted chat, with just a bunch of grapes preserving his modesty

'Yvie is a right laugh. She's got me naked on the first time meeting her so she's doing something right,' he joked.

But in case things don't go to plan with Ciarran, Yvie jokingly eyed off Tommy Little, leaning in towards The Project host and asking if he was still single.

'I've never seen you speechless before,' a laughing Yvie told the stunned and embarrassed 34-year-old comedian.
description: As Angie Kent continues her quest for love on The Bachelorette, her best friend Yvie Jones has already picked a winner.
authors: Demeter Stamell For Daily Mail Australia
